products.name: terraform-ibm-secrets-manager-iam-engine
products.label: IAM secrets engine module
products.short_description: This module configures an IAM secrets engine for an existing secrets manager instance.
products.long_description:
Use this module to configure an IAM secrets engine for an existing secrets manager instance.
#### Usage
```hcl
module "iam_secrets_engine" {
  source                               = "terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-secrets-manager-iam-engine/ibm"
  version                              = "X.X.X"  # Replace "X.X.X" with a release version to lock into a specific release
  resource_group_id                    = "xxXXxxXXxXxXXXXxxXxxxXXXXxXXXXX"
  region                               = "us-south"
  iam_engine_name                      = "iam-engine"
  secrets_manager_guid                 = "XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX"
}
```

features.title: Creates a new ServiceID and assigns role access
features.description: Creates a new ServiceID. Assigns `Editor` role access for `iam-groups`. Assigns `Operator` role access for `iam-identity`.

features.title: Creates a new apikey
features.description: Creates a new apikey for the ServiceID.

features.title: Option to create a secret group
features.description: Option to create a new secret group. Also, provisions to pass an existing secret group.

features.title: Creates a new arbitrary secret
features.description: Creates a new arbitrary secret in the secret group with the generated ServiceID apikey value.

features.title: Creates an IAM engine
features.description: Configures the secret manager instance with the IAM engine using the ServiceID apikey.

diagrams.description: A simple example to set up a secret manager instance and configure IAM secrets engine in that instance.
